The story doesn't progress in a natural way\, the manipulation of the events by the writer is blatantly obvious. In that sense\, the characters are often forced to do things that are out of character or simply incoherent just so the story can be driven to the writer's desired direction. Aside from Ellie\, Joel and Tommy\, the characters weren't duly explored\, which made me think \"if they die now\, I don't care\" a lot. The message about revenge was also poorly conveyed\, mainly because\, once again\, the story feels very artificial.
